data.name: Sands of Salzaar
data.detailed_description:
Feedback Submission

If you encounter any in-game issues or have any advice for our game, please contact us in our Discord channels or fill in the bug report form for submission. The devs will quickly look into the issues and update the game regularly in the following weeks.

Discord: https://discord.gg/xdindie
Bug report form: https://forms.gle/uodXNj9Uz6fHEisn9


About the Game

Sands of Salzaar V.1.0.3 is now available on Steam with new playable characters, wiki updates, LQA progress, and a 40% discount!

If you want to discuss the 1.0.3 update with other players or report bugs, pls join our official Discord (https://discord.gg/xdindie).



OR, to submit any in-game issues to us, you can fill in this bug report form: https://forms.gle/uodXNj9Uz6fHEisn9

If you’re a streamer/YouTuber and interested in reviewing and making content for our game, you can request access by filling in our Content Creator form (https://sbx.gg/sandsofsalzaar) or contacting us by email (indie@xd.com).

Into the Desert…

This is a fantastical tale of an exotic land. The Old Empire has fallen, leaving rival tribes to fight for control of the great desert. Little do they know of the seeds of darkness which grow in the shadows with each passing day...

Sands of Salzaar is an open-world strategy-action RPG set across a sprawling desert. Build up and manage your forces from a single unit to a mighty army, then lead them into massive battles against your foes. How you progress is up to you: customize your hero with a wide variety of skills and talents, choose which factions to side with, and plan your strategies carefully to establish yourself as whoever you aspire to be - a lone wolf, a wealthy trader, a city lord, or a war schemer.

V1.0 Game Features

Epic War & Strategy
Customize your abilities to become a martial arts master, powerful archmage, and more. Recruit and train your force with new features like command skills and a fresh system to upgrade units. Lead them into waves of real-time sieges and skirmishes to win.



Explore a Dynamic Open World
Roam across a giant map to encounter various characters, take on quests, enter deadly dungeons for boss fights and loot, amass gold from trading and build up your own cities…Every playthrough makes you stronger and offers new adventures that reflect the decisions you make.



Alliance or Hostility?
Declare war, or make peace and team up with rival factions utilizing diplomacy tactics. V1.0 introduces more diversity to social relationships and tribal affairs across the land, adding AI rebellions, tribal titles and a new Favor system between NPCs.



What’s More in 1.0 Launch
Discover the free-to-explore Sandbox mode, brand-new UI experiences, reworkings of character skills and arms units across the board, more dynamic social relations and Tavern Brawling, magical jewel packs, additional side quests and more!

data.short_description: Bringing you to an exotic desert where you’ll recruit, train, and guide your troops into battle against rival cities and factions. Embark on an adventure that’s uniquely yours; Customizable characters, professions, and factions. The land is filled with a variety of hidden secrets.
data.supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8 / Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: 2.50GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD4400
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1920x1080 屏幕分辨率
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

highlighted.name: The End is Just a Beginning
